description: Vulnerability scanner and mitigation patch for Log4j2 CVE-2021-44228

Scanner that detects vulnerable Log4J versions (CVE-2021-44228, CVE-2021-45046, etc) on your file-system within any application. It is able to even find instances that are hidden several layers deep. Works on Linux, Windows, and Mac, and everywhere else Java runs, too!
